input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
Asmyna SAMI777HPCDM005NP Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case for SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) - 1 Pack - Retail Packaging - Phoenix Tail

Product specifications:
Add some bling to your ring with beautiful rhinestone crystals along with extra protection from scratches, bumps, dirt, grease and fingerprints
Showcase your own personal style while maintaining the out of the box freshness for your device
Phoenix Tail design in a durable style with a slim and compact form
Easy installation - just press on your phone without any tools
Designed for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II)
Durable slim fit hard plastic snap-on case
Accurate cutouts provide full access to all the functions of your phone including all ports, charging jack and screen

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Asmyna SAMI777HPCDM005NP Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case for SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) - 1 Pack - Retail Packaging - Phoenix Tail is a durable slim fit hard plastic snap-on case designed for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) that showcases your own personal style while maintaining the out of the box freshness for your device. It features a Phoenix Tail design with beautiful rhinestone crystals that add some bling while providing extra protection from scratches, bumps, dirt, grease and fingerprints. The accurate cutouts provide full access to all the functions of your phone including all ports, charging jack and screen so you can easily install it without any tools and enjoy the perfect fit.
input_text.Response B: Add some bling to your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) with this dazzling diamond diamante case. Designed to protect your phone from scratches, bumps, dirt and fingerprints, this case features a beautiful phoenix tail design with rhinestone crystals for added style. Easy to install, this durable plastic case fits snugly over your phone without the need for any tools. Make a statement with this trendy case and protect your phone in style!
